result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

1:34 PM Crt Comm: Timothy C. Heckmann, RPR: Unmonitored DAR, Clk: K. Anderson, Attorney Erica Ellenwood in court for State of Wisconsin, Attorney Jeremiah James Harrelson in court for Eh K Lu Soe, Defendant Eh K Lu Soe in court, in custody by video. Interpreter Len Bathin appeared by Zoom. INCLUDES 22CF582, 22TR2668, 22TR2669, 22TR2670. Atty. Harrelson states that there is an agreement but needs assistance from interpreter to complete documents, notes public defender's office is looking for an attorney for DE for further proceedings as Atty. Harrelson will not continue to represent DE, DE is on PO hold. Court sets PLEAS, confirmed with Interpreter, Interpreter approved to appear via Zoom. Adjourned: 1:46 PM. kma

for Continuance of 10/21 Plea Hearing. Filed by Atty. Harrelson. kma

8:49 AM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. Prosecuting attorney Aaron M. Damrau in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Jeremiah James Harrelson in court for Eh K Lu Soe. Defendant Eh K Lu Soe in court, in custody. Interpreter Cynas Hla appeared by video. Includes 22cf582, 22TR2668, 22TR2669, 22TR2670. Court reviews case. Atty Harrelson states no motions. Atty Harrelson states received offer and close to resolution. ADA Damrau states DE is on a PO hold out of Milwaukee and DE is being revoked with a 60 day sentence. ADA Damrau request quick turn around. Court sets Pleas. Interpreter states he is not available but to contact agency. Adjourned 08:55 AM
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 21, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing on October 21, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Filed by Atty Damrau. arc      e: Atty Harrelson
State filed amended Information with corrections. kma

4:05 PM  Court Commissioner: Tim Heckmann, Reporter: Unmonitored DAR, Clerk: Benoy  Defendant Eh K Lu Soe in court, in custody.  Attorney Jeremiah James Harrelson in court for Eh K Lu Soe.  Attorney Aaron M. Damrau in court for State of Wisconsin.  Interpreter Cynas Hla appeared by video. INCLUDES: Prelim for 22CF582 and INTAKE for 22TR2670, 22TR2668 & 22TR2669.   Interpreter sworn.  State calls Baldwin Officer Joseph Garden. Witness sworn.  State direct.  Witness identifies the DE.  Atty Harrelson cross. Redirect. Witness excused.  Atty Harrelson argument. Response by Atty Damrau.  Court finds probable cause that a felony was committed and the DF probably committed that felony and binds over for trial.  Atty Damrau states the Information will mirror the criminal complaint.  Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Statements by Atty Harrelson as to corrections. State will file an amended Information with corrections. Waives reading.  NG.  Reserves speedy trial.     Bond continues.  Adjourned: 4:43
Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 13, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Pre-trial conference on October 13, 2022 at 08:30 am.

3:36 PM Court Commissioner: Tim Heckmann, Reporter: UNMONITORED DAR. Clerk: K Kittel. Attorney Aaron M. Damrau in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Jeremiah James Harrelson in court w/ Eh K Lu Soe, in person, in custody. Other GBR- Interpreting and Translation Services appeared by phone. INCLUDES:  22CF582, 22TR2668, 22TR2669, 22TR2670. Interpreter sworn. Court notes bond was modified to a signature bond at last hearing. Atty Harrelson waives time limits on PH. Interpreter may appear by zoom. Bond continues in form and amount. Adjourned: 3:43 pm.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 14, 2022 at 04:00 pm.
Preliminary hearing on September 14, 2022 at 04:00 pm.

AMENDED
- Not to operate a motor vehicle without a valid drivers license. 

- It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, M.H.. The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

11:44 AM Court Commissioner: Tim Heckmann, Reporter: Unmonitored DAR, Clerk: Benoy  Defendant Eh K Lu Soe in court, in custody.  Attorney Jeremiah James Harrelson not in court.  Attorney Aaron M. Damrau in court for State of Wisconsin.   Interpreter Cynas Hla appeared by video.  INCLUDES: 22CF582, 22TR2668, 22TR 2669 & 22TR2670.   Interpreter sworn.   Atty Harrelson has now been appointed counsel for DE.  DE has not talked with Atty Harrelson yet.  Atty Damro requests the case be set for Preliminary Hearing next week. Court services officer believes the PO hold is still in effect.  State is still objecting to a signature bond.  Court will modify bond to a 10k signature bond.  All other conditions.  Court finds good cause to continue preliminary hearing.  Court sets STC date - confirmed with interpreter.   If DF is released he may appear by Zoom.   Interpreter will stay on the line and interpret the bond.  Adjourned: 11:59
Status conference scheduled for September 7, 2022 at 03:30 pm.  Clerk contacted Ann @ PD's office & confirmed atty from their office will be at this STC. blk
Status conference on September 7, 2022 at 03:30 pm.
Filed by Atty Harrelson.  gll

11:01 AM Court Commissioner: Tim Heckmann, Reporter: Unmonitored DAR, Clerk: Benoy    Defendant Eh K Lu Soe in court, in custody.  Attorney Aaron M. Damrau in court for State of Wisconsin.  Interpreter Cynas Hla appeared by video.  INCLUDES: 22CF582, 22TR2668, 22TR 2269 & 22TR2670.  22CF582 originally set for a Preliminary Hearing.  Interpreter sworn.   Court notes that he was just notified Atty Harrelson will be appointed Counsel for the DF.  Court questions probation hold.  Court services believes the hold is still in place.  Atty Damrau objects to changing to signature bond. Notes additional charges may be pending.  Court finds good cause to reset the Preliminary Hearing.  Court schedules STC. Confirmed w/ Interpreter in court.  State reviews Atty Harrelson's calendar and believes the date should work for him as well.  Bond continues.  Adjourned:  11:11

03:30 PM Crt Comm: Timothy C. Heckmann, RPR: Unmonitored DAR, Clerk: Christianson.  Prosecuting attorney Aaron M. Damrau in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Stephanie Kay Schmidt in court for Eh K Lu Soe. Defendant Eh K Lu Soe in court, in custody. Interpreter Cynas Peter Hla appeared via video. Includes 22CF582, 22TR2668, 22TR2669, and 22TR2670. Sworn Interpreter. Court confirms address. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. Court reviews probable cause. Defendant understands. DE is currently on a PO Hold. Defendant qualifies for PD. Bond arguments. Court orders bond. Court request Probation agent information and information re: DE. Court to consider bond review once information is received. Speedy prelim demand. Court sets PH. Court approves interpreter to appear via zoom. DE requests speedy trial demand. Adjourned 04:22 PM
Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 30, 2022 at 11:00 am.
